key.name: enabled-docks
key.summary: Array of names of active/enabled docks
key.description: Contains the names of docks which are created and loaded on start up

key.name: alignment
key.summary: The alignment for the dock along the monitor's edge
key.description: Possible values are "fill", "start", "end", and "center".

key.name: auto-pinning
key.summary: Automatically pin an application if it seems useful to do
key.description: If true, automatically pin applications when it seems useful to do.

key.name: current-workspace-only
key.summary: Only show windows from the current workspace
key.description: If true, only show unpinned windows from the current workspace in addition to pinned items.

key.name: dock-items
key.description: Array of dockitem-files for this particular dock. This list is automatically updated and managed by Plank. DO NOT MODIFY.

key.name: hide-delay
key.description: Length of the delay before hiding the dock, in milliseconds.

key.name: hide-mode
key.description: Possible values are "none", "intelligent", "auto", "dodge-maximized", "window-dodge", and "dodge-active".

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of dock items, in pixels.

key.name: items-alignment
key.description: Possible values are "fill", "start", "end", and "center".

key.name: lock-items
key.description: If true, prevent drag'n'drop actions and lock dock items in place.

key.name: monitor
key.summary: The name of the monitor for the dock to show on
key.description: The plug-name of the monitor for the dock to show on (e.g. DVI-I-1, HDMI1, LVDS1). Leave this empty to keep on the primary monitor.

key.name: offset
key.description: The dock's position offset from center, in percent.

key.name: pinned-only
key.description: If true, only show pinned applications. Useful for running more than one dock.

key.name: position
key.summary: The position for the dock on the monitor
key.description: Possible values are "left", "right", "top", and "bottom".

key.name: pressure-reveal
key.description: If true, use pressure-based revealing of the dock if the input device supports it.

key.name: show-dock-item
key.summary: Show the item for the dock itself
key.description: If true, show the Plank dock item.

key.name: theme
key.summary: The name of the dock theme for Plank to use
key.description: Built-in values include "Default", "Matte", "Transparent", and "Gtk+".

key.name: tooltips-enabled
key.summary: Show tooltips when items are hovered
key.description: If true, tooltips will be shown when dock items are hovered with the cursor.

key.name: unhide-delay
key.description: Length of the delay before unhiding the dock, in milliseconds.

key.name: zoom-enabled
key.description: If true, zoom dock items when hovered with the cursor.

key.name: zoom-percent
key.description: The amount to zoom dock items, in percent.
